title: alias_method': undefined method `raw_push' for class `Class' in 'sidekiq/testing'
body:
Hello,
    I'm having an error which wasn't showing off before either some recent sidekiq release or me switching away from ActiveRecord in favor of Mongoid.

Here is the entire code of a_spec.rb:

```
require 'sidekiq/testing'

describe A do
end
```

And the error is 

```
/home/muichkine/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.0.0-rc2/gems/sidekiq-2.13.1/lib/sidekiq/testing.rb:7:in `alias_method': undefined method `raw_push' for class `Class' (NameError)
from /home/muichkine/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.0.0-rc2/gems/sidekiq-2.13.1/lib/sidekiq/testing.rb:7:in `singleton class'
from /home/muichkine/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.0.0-rc2/gems/sidekiq-2.13.1/lib/sidekiq/testing.rb:6:in `<class:Client>'
from /home/muichkine/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.0.0-rc2/gems/sidekiq-2.13.1/lib/sidekiq/testing.rb:5:in `<module:Sidekiq>'
from /home/muichkine/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.0.0-rc2/gems/sidekiq-2.13.1/lib/sidekiq/testing.rb:1:in `<top (required)>'
```

Here is my bundle show:
